Farm, CEX, Audit, and Liquidity Voting Open Now!

18 September 2020

The first batch of community governance porposals are ready for your votes. Simply go to dao.octo.fi, check the proposals, and have your say.

If you need instructions on using Snapshot check OIP-0.

Proposals:

  • OIP-0 How To Use Snapshot & Create Proposals
  • OIP-1 Adding of functions to Aquafarm
  • OIP-2 CEX Listings
  • OIP-3 Smart Contract Audit
  • OIP-4 Adding of Uniswap liquidity

Do Your Octopus Research #DYOR

Simple Breakdown of the OctoFi Project Roadmap Brace Yourselves, OCTObrrr is coming...

Decentralized Finance Oracles Tentacles?

Our open source, VC-free, community owned platform is just the beginning.

On top of regular updates to the interface, we're busy building incentivised oracle aggregators that will be kept honest by the community.

DeFi depends on trustworthy data, so why trust a single oracle when you can trust your friends' appraisals of them ALL?

Join us to level the playing field and together we can wrap our tentacles around a sea of gains.
